text.autoconfig.svcgroupplayernames.opti: If enabled, player names will only be displayed when the respective player is talking.
Sets the transparency of the player names when the respective player is talking. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.
Sets the transparency of the player names when the respective player is not talking. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.
text.autoconfig.svcgroupplayernames.titl: Simple Voice Chat Group Player Names
